update T_User
Open_Id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AvatarUrl = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Nick_Name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Union_Id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

money = #{money,jdbcType=REAL},
create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_Time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where User_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update T_User set Open_Id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AvatarUrl = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Nick_Name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Union_Id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_Value = #{createValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money = #{money,jdbcType=REAL}, create_Time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_Time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where User_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert: insert into T_User (open_Id, AvatarUrl,Nick_Name, gender, city, `language`, province, country, Union_Id, create_Time) values (#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update T_User
avatarUrl = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_Name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
union_Id = #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

money = #{money,jdbcType=REAL},
where open_Id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN b.para is not null THEN b.para else 0 END FROM ( SELECT COALESCE (create_Value,0) as para FROM T_User WHERE User_Id=#{userId})b
